title: Misplaced maven artifacts
description: Maven artifacts of recently released Solr 1.4.1 at maven central repository have been uploaded to a wrong path. See related mailinglist topic for more details here. Maybe this can be solved by reporting issue at Maven Evangelsim or Maven Upload Requests.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content:
